alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 29 at 9:18AM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY BELOW 35 PERCENT AND SUSTAINED 20 FOOT WINDS GREATER THAN 15 MPH ALONG WITH ERC`S OF 27 OR GREATER FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 068...071...072...073...074...168...172...173 AND 267... The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EST this evening. * Affected area...fire weather zones 068...071...072...073... 074...168...172...173 and 267. * Wind...15 TO 20 MPH * Humidity...UPPER 20S TO LOWER 30S. * Impacts...any fires that develop will likely see extreme fire behavior. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
